about.title: Acerca de UniTools
about.intro: UniTools es una plataforma de utilidades en línea que ofrece 200+ herramientas basadas en navegador para tareas digitales diarias.

mission.title: Nuestra Misión
mission.desc: Consolidar todas las herramientas digitales esenciales en una plataforma.

privacy.title: Privacidad Primero
privacy.desc: Todo el procesamiento de archivos ocurre directamente en tu navegador.

speed.title: Ultrarrápido
speed.desc: El procesamiento del lado del cliente significa resultados instantáneos.

global.title: Acceso Global
global.desc: Disponible en todo el mundo con soporte multiidioma.

whyUs.title: ¿Por qué elegir UniTools?
whyUs.item2: Sin registro requerido - Usa cualquier herramienta al instante
whyUs.item3: Privacidad garantizada - Los archivos se procesan localmente
whyUs.item4: Funciona sin conexión - Muchas herramientas funcionan sin internet

tools.title: 200+ Herramientas a tu alcance
tools.desc: Desde manipulación de PDF hasta edición de imágenes - UniTools tiene todo lo que necesitas.

highlight.title: Tu privacidad es nuestra prioridad
highlight.desc: Todo el procesamiento ocurre en tu navegador. Tus archivos NUNCA se suben a nuestros servidores.

noServer.title: Procesamiento 100% del lado del cliente
noServer.desc: UniTools usa tecnologías del navegador para procesar todos los archivos localmente.
noServer.item1: Tus archivos nunca salen de tu dispositivo
noServer.item2: No se transmiten datos a nuestros servidores
noServer.item3: Tu trabajo permanece completamente privado y seguro

dataCollection.title: Qué recopilamos
dataCollection.desc: Recopilamos datos mínimos necesarios para mejorar nuestro servicio.

analytics.title: Datos de análisis
analytics.desc: Usamos análisis que respetan la privacidad. Estos datos son anónimos.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.desc: Usamos cookies esenciales para recordar tus preferencias.

thirdParty.title: Servicios de terceros
thirdParty.desc: Mostramos anuncios a través de Google AdSense para mantener el servicio gratuito.

changes.title: Cambios de política
changes.desc: Podemos actualizar esta política de privacidad periódicamente.

contact.title: Contáctenos
contact.desc: Si tienes preguntas sobre nuestras prácticas de privacidad, contáctanos.

acceptance.title: Aceptación de términos
acceptance.desc: Al acceder y usar UniTools, aceptas estar sujeto a estos Términos de Servicio.

description.title: Descripción del servicio
description.desc: UniTools proporciona herramientas en línea gratuitas. Todo el procesamiento se realiza en tu navegador.

use.title: Uso aceptable
use.desc: Aceptas usar UniTools solo para propósitos legales. Aceptas NO:
use.item1: Usar nuestro servicio para cualquier propósito ilegal
use.item2: Intentar probar vulnerabilidades de nuestros sistemas

ip.title: Propiedad intelectual
ip.desc: El nombre y logo de UniTools están protegidos por leyes de derechos de autor.

disclaimer.title: Descargo de garantías
disclaimer.desc: UniTools se proporciona 'tal cual' sin garantías.

liability.title: Limitación de responsabilidad
liability.desc: UniTools no será responsable de daños indirectos.

changes.title: Cambios de términos
changes.desc: Nos reservamos el derecho de modificar estos términos.

governing.title: Ley aplicable
governing.desc: Estos términos se regirán por las leyes internacionales aplicables.

contact.title: Contáctenos
contact.subtitle: ¿Tienes preguntas, sugerencias o comentarios? ¡Nos encantaría saber de ti!

success.title: ¡Mensaje enviado!
success.desc: Gracias por contactarnos. Te responderemos lo antes posible.

pdf-to-jpg.description: Convierte archivos PDF a imágenes JPG de alta calidad al instante.

jpg-to-pdf.title: JPG a PDF
jpg-to-pdf.description: Combina múltiples imágenes JPG en un solo archivo PDF.

merge-pdf.title: Fusionar PDF
merge-pdf.description: Combina múltiples archivos PDF en uno.

split-pdf.title: Dividir PDF
split-pdf.description: Divide un archivo PDF en múltiples archivos.

compress-pdf.title: Comprimir PDF
compress-pdf.description: Reduce el tamaño del archivo PDF para compartir más fácilmente.

png-to-jpg.description: Convierte imágenes PNG a formato JPG.

jpg-to-png.description: Convierte imágenes JPG a formato PNG.

webp-to-jpg.description: Convierte imágenes WebP a formato JPG.

resize-image.title: Redimensionar imagen
resize-image.description: Ajusta el ancho y alto de tus imágenes a cualquier tamaño.

crop-image.description: Recorta el área deseada de tus imágenes.

compress-image.title: Comprimir imagen
compress-image.description: Reduce el tamaño del archivo de imagen para optimización web.

convert-image.title: Convertir formato de imagen
convert-image.description: Convierte imágenes a diferentes formatos (JPG, PNG, WebP).
convert-image.instructions: Selecciona archivos de imagen para convertir y elige el formato de salida.

video-to-gif.title: Video a GIF
video-to-gif.description: Convierte archivos de video a GIF animado.
video-to-gif.instructions: Selecciona un video para convertir a GIF. Puedes ajustar FPS, tamaño, tiempo de inicio y duración.

heic-to-jpg.title: HEIC a JPG
heic-to-jpg.description: Convert iPhone HEIC photos to JPG format for Windows compatibility.

webp-converter.title: Convertidor WebP
webp-converter.description: Convert images to Google's WebP format for optimized web performance.

svg-to-png.title: SVG a PNG
svg-to-png.description: Convert vector SVG graphics to PNG images.

bulk-convert-image.title: Conversión masiva de imágenes
bulk-convert-image.description: Convert multiple images to a different format at once.

webp-to-png.title: WebP to PNG
webp-to-png.description: Convert WebP images to PNG format.

gif-to-png.title: GIF to PNG
gif-to-png.description: Extract the first frame of GIF as PNG image.

image-upscaler.title: Image Upscaler
image-upscaler.description: Enhance and upscale low-resolution images using AI.

canvas-size.title: Change Canvas Size
canvas-size.description: Extend the canvas area around your image without resizing.

remove-background.title: Remove Background
remove-background.description: Automatically remove background from photos with one click.

image-mosaic.title: Image Mosaic
image-mosaic.description: Blur or pixelate specific areas of your image.

image-watermark.title: Add Watermark
image-watermark.description: Add text or image watermarks to protect your images.

image-brightness.title: Brightness Adjustment
image-brightness.description: Adjust the brightness and contrast of your images.

grayscale-filter.title: Grayscale Filter
grayscale-filter.description: Convert color images to black and white.

image-text.title: Add Text to Image
image-text.description: Add custom text with various fonts to your images.

remove-exif.title: Remove EXIF Data
remove-exif.description: Remove metadata and location info from your photos.

round-corners.title: Round Corners
round-corners.description: Add rounded corners to your images.

image-shadow.title: Add Shadow
image-shadow.description: Add a drop shadow effect to your images.

color-picker.title: Selector de color
color-picker.description: Extract dominant colors and color palette from images.

image-joiner.title: Join Images
image-joiner.description: Combine multiple images horizontally or vertically.

create-gif.title: Crear GIF
create-gif.description: Create animated GIF from multiple images.
create-gif.dragHint: Drag images or click to browse

image-border.title: Add Border
image-border.description: Add custom colored borders to your images.

image-opacity.title: Adjust Opacity
image-opacity.description: Change the transparency level of your images.

image-ratio.title: Change Aspect Ratio
image-ratio.description: Adjust images to specific aspect ratios (1:1, 4:3, 16:9).

favicon-generator.title: Favicon Generator
favicon-generator.description: Create favicon icons for websites from any image.

trim-video.title: Recortar video
trim-video.description: Cut video clips to desired length by setting start and end points.
trim-video.instructions: Upload a video and set start/end times to trim.

mute-video.title: Mute Video
mute-video.description: Remove audio track from video files to create silent videos.
mute-video.instructions: Upload a video to remove its audio track.

extract-audio.title: Extraer audio
extract-audio.description: Extract audio from video files and save as MP3.
extract-audio.instructions: Upload a video to extract its audio as MP3.

video-speed.title: Video Speed
video-speed.description: Change video playback speed (slow motion or fast forward).
video-speed.instructions: Upload a video and select playback speed.

video-capture.title: Video Capture
video-capture.description: Capture specific frames from video as high-quality images.
video-capture.instructions: Upload a video and select timestamp to capture.

convert-video.title: Convert Video
convert-video.description: Convert videos between formats (MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI).
convert-video.instructions: Upload a video and select output format.

resize-video.title: Resize Video
resize-video.description: Change video dimensions for different platforms (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube).
resize-video.instructions: Upload a video and select new dimensions.

compress-video.title: Comprimir video
compress-video.description: Reduce video file size while maintaining quality.
compress-video.instructions: Upload a video and select compression quality.

flip-video.title: Flip Video
flip-video.description: Flip videos horizontally or vertically (mirror effect).
flip-video.instructions: Upload a video and select flip direction.

trim-audio.title: Trim Audio
trim-audio.description: Cut audio files to create ringtones or clips.
trim-audio.instructions: Upload an audio file and set start/end times to trim.

join-audio.title: Join Audio
join-audio.description: Merge multiple audio files into one.
join-audio.instructions: Upload audio files to merge in order.

convert-audio.title: Convert Audio
convert-audio.description: Convert audio files between formats (MP3, WAV, OGG).
convert-audio.instructions: Upload an audio file and select output format.

boost-audio.title: Boost Audio Volume
boost-audio.description: Increase volume of quiet audio recordings.
boost-audio.instructions: Upload an audio file and adjust volume level.

reverse-audio.title: Reverse Audio
reverse-audio.description: Play audio backwards for creative effects.
reverse-audio.instructions: Upload an audio file to reverse.

audio-bitrate.title: Audio Bitrate
audio-bitrate.description: Change audio quality and file size by adjusting bitrate.
audio-bitrate.instructions: Upload an audio file and select bitrate.

audio-visualizer.title: Audio Visualizer
audio-visualizer.description: Create waveform visualization video from audio.
audio-visualizer.instructions: Upload an audio file to create a visualizer video.

video-metadata.title: Video Metadata
video-metadata.description: View detailed information about video files (codec, resolution, duration).
video-metadata.instructions: Upload a video to view its metadata.

voice-recorder.title: Voice Recorder
voice-recorder.description: Record audio using your microphone directly in browser.
voice-recorder.instructions: Click the button to start recording from your microphone.

screen-recorder.title: Grabador de pantalla
screen-recorder.description: Record your screen directly in the browser.
screen-recorder.instructions: Click start to record your screen. You can include microphone audio.

image-ocr.title: Image Text Extraction (OCR)
image-ocr.description: Extract text from images using OCR technology. Supports Korean, English, Japanese, and Chinese.
image-ocr.instructions: Upload an image to extract text. Select the language for better accuracy.

pdf-text-extract.title: PDF Text Extraction
pdf-text-extract.description: Extract selectable text from PDF documents. Works with PDFs created from Word, web pages, or text documents.
pdf-text-extract.instructions: Upload a PDF file to extract its text content.
pdf-text-extract.explanation: This tool extracts selectable text that is embedded in PDF files. It works for PDFs created from text documents, Word files, or web pages.
pdf-text-extract.ocrHint: For scanned documents or image-based PDFs where text cannot be selected, use the OCR PDF tool instead.

character-count.title: Character Counter
character-count.description: Count characters, words, sentences, and paragraphs in real-time.
character-count.instructions: Paste or type text to see character and word statistics.
character-count.placeholder: Paste or type your text here...

phrase-saver.title: Phrase Saver
phrase-saver.description: Save frequently used phrases and copy them with a single click.
phrase-saver.instructions: Add phrases you use often for quick copying.
phrase-saver.storageNotice: Saved phrases are stored in this browser only. They won't be accessible from other devices or browsers, and will be deleted if you clear browser data.
phrase-saver.example4: Please contact me if you have any questions.

dictionary.title: Dictionary
dictionary.description: Look up word definitions. Powered by Wikipedia with multi-language support.
dictionary.instructions: Enter a word and select a language to search.
dictionary.notFoundHint: Try a different keyword or change the language.
dictionary.poweredBy: Powered by Wikipedia API. Free to use.
dictionary.disambiguationNote: This word has multiple meanings. Check Wikipedia for more details.

text-to-speech.title: Text to Speech
text-to-speech.description: Convert text to speech. Supports multiple languages and voices.
text-to-speech.instructions: Enter text, adjust voice, speed, and pitch, then play.
text-to-speech.notSupported: Your browser does not support speech synthesis. Please use a modern browser like Chrome, Firefox, or Safari.
text-to-speech.speakError: An error occurred while playing audio
text-to-speech.browserNote: Uses browser's built-in speech engine. Available voices may vary by device and browser.

case-converter.title: Case Converter
case-converter.description: Convert text between uppercase, lowercase, title case, and more.
case-converter.instructions: Enter text and choose a case conversion option.

line-break-remover.title: Line Break Remover
line-break-remover.description: Remove unnecessary line breaks and merge text into a single line.
line-break-remover.instructions: Paste text with unwanted line breaks to merge into one line.

remove-duplicates.title: Remove Duplicate Lines
remove-duplicates.description: Remove duplicate lines from your text, keeping only unique entries.
remove-duplicates.instructions: Paste text with duplicate lines to remove them.

text-sort.title: Text Sorter
text-sort.description: Sort text lines alphabetically, reverse, or by length.
text-sort.instructions: Paste lines of text and choose a sorting order.

find-replace.title: Find and Replace
find-replace.description: Find specific text and replace it with something else.
find-replace.instructions: Enter the text to find and what to replace it with.

blank-line-remover.title: Blank Line Remover
blank-line-remover.description: Remove empty lines from your text.
blank-line-remover.instructions: Paste text to remove all blank lines.

prefix-suffix.title: Add Prefix/Suffix
prefix-suffix.description: Add text before or after each line.
prefix-suffix.instructions: Enter prefix and/or suffix to add to each line.

csv-to-json.title: CSV to JSON
csv-to-json.description: Convert CSV data to JSON format for developers.
csv-to-json.instructions: Paste CSV data to convert to JSON.

json-to-csv.title: JSON to CSV
json-to-csv.description: Convert JSON data to CSV format for Excel.
json-to-csv.instructions: Paste JSON array to convert to CSV.

xml-to-json.title: XML to JSON
xml-to-json.description: Convert XML data to JSON format.
xml-to-json.instructions: Paste XML data to convert to JSON.

yaml-to-json.title: YAML to JSON
yaml-to-json.description: Convert YAML configuration to JSON format.
yaml-to-json.instructions: Paste YAML data to convert to JSON.

text-to-list.title: Text to List
text-to-list.description: Convert comma-separated or delimited text into a numbered list.
text-to-list.instructions: Enter delimited text to convert to a numbered list.

dummy-generator.title: Dummy Data Generator
dummy-generator.description: Generate fake names, emails, addresses, and phone numbers for testing.
dummy-generator.instructions: Select the fields and amount of dummy data to generate.
dummy-generator.selectField: Please select at least one field

lorem-ipsum.title: Generador Lorem Ipsum
lorem-ipsum.description: Generate placeholder text for design mockups.
lorem-ipsum.instructions: Select the number of paragraphs, sentences, or words to generate.
lorem-ipsum.placeholder: Click Generate to create placeholder text...

markdown-preview.title: Markdown Preview
markdown-preview.description: Preview Markdown text as rendered HTML in real-time.
markdown-preview.instructions: Write Markdown on the left to see the rendered preview on the right.

regex-tester.title: Regex Tester
regex-tester.description: Test and debug regular expressions with real-time matching.

url-encode.title: Codificador/Decodificador URL
url-encode.description: Encode or decode URL special characters.
url-encode.instructions: Enter text to encode for URLs or decode URL-encoded text.

base64-text.title: Base64 Text Converter
base64-text.description: Encode text to Base64 or decode Base64 to text.
base64-text.instructions: Enter text to encode to Base64 or decode Base64 to text.

html-entity.title: HTML Entity Converter
html-entity.description: Convert special characters to HTML entities and vice versa.
html-entity.instructions: Enter text to convert special characters to HTML entities.

diff-checker.title: Text Diff Checker
diff-checker.description: Compare two texts and highlight the differences.
diff-checker.instructions: Paste two texts to compare and see differences highlighted.

word-frequency.title: Word Frequency Analyzer
word-frequency.description: Analyze which words are used most frequently in your text.
word-frequency.instructions: Paste text to see word frequency statistics.
word-frequency.placeholder: Paste your text here to analyze word frequency...

text-shuffle.title: Text Shuffler
text-shuffle.description: Randomly shuffle the order of lines or words.
text-shuffle.instructions: Enter lines of text to shuffle randomly.

binary-converter.title: Binary Converter
binary-converter.description: Convert text to binary (0s and 1s) and vice versa.
binary-converter.instructions: Enter text to convert to binary or binary to decode to text.
binary-converter.textPlaceholder: Enter text to convert to binary...

morse-code.title: Morse Code Converter
morse-code.description: Convert text to Morse code and Morse code to text.
morse-code.instructions: Enter text to convert to Morse code.
morse-code.textPlaceholder: Enter text to convert to morse code...

web-text-extract.title: Web Page Text Extractor
web-text-extract.instructions: Copy and paste HTML code from View Page Source (Ctrl+U) to extract text.
web-text-extract.htmlPlaceholder: Paste HTML code here (Ctrl+U in browser to view source)...
web-text-extract.noTextFound: No text content found in the provided HTML.

json-formatter.title: Formateador JSON
json-formatter.description: Format and validate JSON data beautifully.
json-formatter.instructions: Paste JSON to format or validate.

base64-encode.title: Codificador Base64
base64-encode.description: Encode text or files to Base64.

hash-generator.title: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Generate various hashes like MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256.

unit-converter.title: Convertidor de unidades
unit-converter.description: Convert various units like length, weight, temperature.

pdf-to-png.title: PDF to PNG
pdf-to-png.description: Convert PDF files to high-quality PNG images with transparency support.

png-to-pdf.title: PNG to PDF
png-to-pdf.description: Convert PNG images to a single PDF file.

pdf-to-word.title: PDF to Word
pdf-to-word.description: Convert PDF files to editable Word documents.

word-to-pdf.title: Word to PDF
word-to-pdf.description: Convert Word documents to PDF format.

pdf-to-excel.title: PDF to Excel
pdf-to-excel.description: Extract tables from PDF and convert to Excel spreadsheets.

excel-to-pdf.title: Excel to PDF
excel-to-pdf.description: Convert Excel spreadsheets to PDF format.

pdf-to-ppt.title: PDF to PowerPoint
pdf-to-ppt.description: Convert PDF files to PowerPoint presentations.

ppt-to-pdf.title: PowerPoint to PDF
ppt-to-pdf.description: Convert PowerPoint presentations to PDF format.

rotate-pdf.title: Rotate PDF
rotate-pdf.description: Rotate PDF pages to any angle (90, 180, 270 degrees).

delete-pdf-pages.title: Delete PDF Pages
delete-pdf-pages.description: Remove unwanted pages from your PDF files.

extract-pdf-pages.title: Extract PDF Pages
extract-pdf-pages.description: Extract specific pages from a PDF to create a new file.

organize-pdf.title: Organize PDF
organize-pdf.description: Reorder, rotate, and organize PDF pages with drag and drop.

protect-pdf.title: Protect PDF
protect-pdf.description: Add password protection to your PDF files.
protect-pdf.successNote: Your PDF is now password protected
protect-pdf.browserLimitation: Due to browser-based processing, protection may only work in some PDF viewers

unlock-pdf.title: Unlock PDF
unlock-pdf.description: Remove password protection from PDF files.

sign-pdf.title: Sign PDF
sign-pdf.description: Add digital signatures to your PDF documents.
sign-pdf.successMessage: Your PDF has been signed successfully.

watermark-pdf.title: Watermark PDF
watermark-pdf.description: Add text or image watermarks to PDF files.

edit-pdf.title: Edit PDF
edit-pdf.description: Edit text, images, and annotations in PDF files.

ocr-pdf.title: OCR PDF (Scanned Documents)
ocr-pdf.description: Extract text from scanned PDFs or image-based PDFs using optical character recognition. Supports Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, French, and German.
ocr-pdf.successMessage: OCR completed. Text layer added to PDF.
ocr-pdf.explanation: Use this tool for scanned documents or image-based PDFs where text cannot be selected. The OCR engine recognizes text from images and makes it searchable and copyable.
ocr-pdf.textExtractHint: For PDFs where you can already select text, use the PDF Text Extraction tool for faster and more accurate results.

repair-pdf.title: Repair PDF
repair-pdf.description: Fix corrupted or damaged PDF files.

optimize-pdf.title: Optimize PDF
optimize-pdf.description: Optimize PDF for web or reduce file size while maintaining quality.

pdf-to-text.title: PDF to Text
pdf-to-text.description: Extract text content from PDF files and save as plain text.

html-to-pdf.title: HTML to PDF
html-to-pdf.description: Convert web pages or HTML code to PDF documents.

add-page-numbers.title: Add Page Numbers
add-page-numbers.description: Automatically add page numbers to all pages of your PDF.

crop-pdf.title: Crop PDF
crop-pdf.description: Remove margins and white space from PDF pages.

grayscale-pdf.title: Grayscale PDF
grayscale-pdf.description: Convert color PDF to black and white to save on printing costs.

resize-pdf.title: Resize PDF
resize-pdf.description: Change PDF page size from A4 to Letter, A3, or other formats.

n-up-pdf.title: PDF Multi-Page Layout
n-up-pdf.description: Combine multiple PDF pages onto a single sheet to save paper. Print 2, 4, 6, or 9 pages per sheet.
n-up-pdf.explanation: This tool shrinks and arranges multiple pages onto a single sheet, perfect for handouts, reviewing documents, or saving paper when printing.

instagram-line-break.title: Instagram Line Break Generator
instagram-line-break.description: Create perfect line breaks for Instagram captions that won't disappear when posted.
instagram-line-break.notice: Instagram removes regular line breaks. This tool uses invisible characters to preserve your formatting.

hashtag-generator.title: Hashtag Generator
hashtag-generator.description: Generate popular and relevant hashtags for your social media posts.

instagram-font.title: Instagram Font Converter
instagram-font.description: Convert regular text to fancy Unicode fonts for Instagram bio and captions.
instagram-font.hint: Enter text above to see it converted to 20+ different font styles

tiktok-safe-zone.title: TikTok Safe Zone Checker

elimination-wheel.rule4: 4. The last person standing is the winner!

liar-game.title: Liar Game
liar-game.description: Find the liar among players! Perfect for broadcasts and parties!
liar-game.customWordPlaceholder: Enter custom word or leave empty
liar-game.rule1: One player is randomly selected as the liar.
liar-game.rule2: Each player checks the word in turn. The liar sees "You are the liar".
liar-game.rule3: Take turns describing the word. The liar must pretend to know it.
liar-game.rule4: After discussion, vote to find the liar.
liar-game.rule5: If the liar is found, citizens win. Otherwise, the liar wins!
liar-game.tip1: Being too specific gives the liar hints.
liar-game.tip2: Being too vague makes you look suspicious.
liar-game.tip3: As liar, listen carefully to others and blend in.
liar-game.liarHint: You don't know the word. Act natural!
liar-game.votingDesc: After discussion, vote for who you think is the liar

ladder-game.rule3: Click a participant name to show their path.
